properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 4 at 9:54AM CST until January 8 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Paradise

.Recent heavy rainfall will keep the river above flood stage
for the next several days. The river will crest at 383.8 this
evening, then fall slowly. It is forecast to fall below flood
stage next Wednesday afternoon.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise.
* until Wednesday evening.
* At  9:15 AM Saturday the stage was 383.6 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 383.8 feet by
this evening. The river will fall below flood stage Wednesday early
afternoon.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
